info.label: Software Engineer
info.brief: I am a hands-on software engineer, passionate about code quality, design and innovation. I am known to be a proactive learner, with great planning and negotiation skills and the capability of successfully handling multiple tasks simultaneously

history.summary: Technical leadership of systems for advanced process control and business intelligence for industries, involving both desktop and cloud applications. Development in Go and TypeScript and deployment in AWS
highlights: Developing an industry-focused business intelligence software from conception to delivery, using Go, React, AngularJS, InfluxDB, PostgreSQL and GRPC
Responsible for the introduction of DevOps culture and tools to the web development team, setting up the AWS environment, CircleCI and Heroku
Leadership of the back-end development team and tech leadership of web projects

history.summary: Work as web developer and project manager focused at delivering full production-ready systems developed from begining to end using Ruby on Rails, ElasticSearch, MongoDB and PostgreSQL
highlights: Built large education ERP for the largest private educational company in the world
Fully remote work with multiple teams of developers, designers and managers around the world
Responsibility over estimations, deliveries and direct contact with clients and stakeholders

history.summary: Engaged on developing REST APIs, business intelligence tools, Social Marketing engines and iOS applications for the Social-ID Marketing Platform. Coding mostly in Ruby (Rails), JavaScript (AngularJS) and Objective-C (iOS)
highlights: Responsible for maintaining a large iOS SDK and several apps, both in Swift and Objective-C
Occasionally worked as Sales Engineer, being responsible for a successful partnership with IBM
Worked with a cross-cultural/international team of engineers over a large monolithic Ruby on Rails application

history.summary: We have created Chefia, a set of tools to improve restaurants' costumer service and overall clients' experience through a complete overall of how orders are dealt with, using Ruby, Swift, Objective-C and Swift
highlights: Created cross-platform app from the ground up, with native versions for iOS and Android
Company investment earned as a prize from Apple Developer Academy
Startup ended up unsuccessful for commercial reasons

projects.title: Liris
projects.description: Business intelligence tool for industrial process visualization with added Artificial Intelligence algorithms. Development of multiple subsystems/microservices in Go and TypeScript
highlights: Large project dealing with sensitive data over protected networks deployed securely to AWS
Developed multiple APIs - REST, GraphQL and GRPC

projects.title: Sistema Blox
projects.description: A full web-based ERP for managing schools under a new and innovative educational system. Developed in Ruby on Rails and React
highlights: Responsible for software architecture and database management
Responsible for developing, documenting and testing the GraphQL API

projects.title: Social-ID for IBM UBX
projects.description: A set of plugins and APIs to allow easy communication between Social-ID social platform and IBM cloud solutions. Development in Java and Ruby
highlights: Responsible for software architecture and development with direct aid from senior IBM engineers
Awarded with an opportunity to present solution at IBM Amplify 2017
